name: Schematic Builder

pages.text: Schematic builder can build VMod schematics.$(br)To use:$(li)Place builder somewhere$(li)Add extensions (by default it's oak planks, but you can change it with datapack) to it (up/down, left/right, front/back). Length of the extensions will determine how big of an object it can build.$(li)Place containers directly next to extensions (chests, shulkers, etc)$(br)
pages.title: Schematic Builder

pages.text: It should look something like this

pages: Schematic builder will use blocks from containers to build schematic.$(br)You can also trigger build with redstone signal.
